import React from 'react' import Pdf from "react-to-pdf"; import logo from "../assets/logo.PNG"; import "./PDF.css"; const ref=React.createRef(); const PDF =(props)=>{ return (

Inventory Stock Availability Report

  • Inventory ID
  • {props.inid}
  • Quantity In Stock Currently
  • {props.qinstock}
  • Item name
  • {props.name}
  • Item Category
  • {props.category}
  • Currently Used Quantity
  • {props.qusedpresent}
  • Unit Price
  • {props.unitprice}
  • Total Cost For Inventory
  • {props.totcost}
{({ toPdf }) => }
); } export default PDF;
